pageContext.claim: “The Palestinians, I think, are wanting to come back to the table very badly.”
pageContext.analysis: After President Trump announced he was moving the U.S. Embassy to Jerusalem, Palestinian politicians said they no longer felt that the U.S. would be a fair negotiator in the peace process. Husam Zomlot, a Palestinian leader, told the New Yorker, Palestinians want peace, but the American role, "could be substituted or replaced" by other world leaders.
